ComicInfo.Summary: All Hell breaks loose when the Gladstone's Cadets take on their parents? old superhero nemesis. But have they bitten off more than they can chew? Can they restore their parents? villainous honor? It's an action-packed "don't miss" issue, with far reaching events that change the Gladstone's universe forever.
